lead_paragraph: A 2009 shooting sparked riots in downtown Oakland, and city officials seem wary of a repeat as closing arguments begin Thursday.
snippet: A 2009 shooting sparked riots in downtown Oakland, and city officials seem wary of a repeat as closing arguments begin Thursday.

headline.main: Oakland Prepares for Response to Trial Verdict
headline.print_headline: Oakland Prepares for Response to Trial Verdict

byline.contributor: Malia Wollan contributed reporting from Oakland, and Rebecca Cathcart from Los Angeles.
